meanings.sent1: The school principal was the inaugurators of the new library.
meanings.sent2: The inaugurators of the event welcomed the guests with a speech.
meanings.sent3: The inaugurators of the party forgot to bring the cake!
meanings.sent4: The team captain acted as the inaugurators of the game, leading the team to victory.
meanings.sent5: The community members were the inaugurators of the neighborhood clean-up project.

meanings.definition: The act of inaugurating or beginning something.
meanings.sent1: The inauguration of the new building was a grand event.
meanings.sent2: The inaugurators of the project faced many challenges along the way.
meanings.sent3: The family's pet dog became the inaugurators of chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise marked the inaugurators of a new day filled with possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The first note played by the musician was the inaugurators of a beautiful melody.
